channel.title: Make a teleport command that allows admins and above to teleport out of the wild
channel.description: tital is self explinatory... i want to make a command to allow anyone that is at least an admin to teleport out of the wildy using one specific command... not any teleport but just one specific command.. help me please? :)

item.title: Make a teleport command that allows admins and above to teleport out of the wild
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

If (command.equalsIgnoreCase (“GetMeOutOfHere”) && p.rights <= 2 && c.IsWilderness))
Then the tele goes here! {

item.title: Make a teleport command that allows admins and above to teleport out of the wild
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“xneonx, post:3, topic:417597”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("blahblah") && (playerRights > 1) && (!isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1))) { triggerTele(####, ####, 0); }
Or you could also try

[code=java]
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“outwildy”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
triggerTele(2758, 3495, 0);

}[/code][/quote]How do you know he’s using Delta 317?

Read full topic
